homePageDescription: Quickly find departments and extensions across the entire organization.
settingsDescription: Manage application settings, import XML files, and configure appearance.
appearanceDescription: Customize the look and feel of the application.
languageDescription: Choose your preferred language for the application interface.
importOverwriteWarning: Importing files will overwrite existing files with the same name in the target directory. Please ensure you are uploading the correct files.
addLocalityDialogDescription: Enter the name for the new locality. This will create a new XML file and update the zone file.
editLocalityDialogDescription: Change the name of this locality. This will update the zone file and rename the department XML file.
addExtensionDialogDescription: Enter the details for the new extension. This will update the locality's XML file.
extensionNumberInvalid: SERVER: Extension telephone must be a valid number.
addBranchDialogDescription: Enter the name for the new branch. This will create a new XML file in the Branch directory and update the zone file.
editDialogGeneralDescription: Change the name of this item. This will update the parent XML file and rename the corresponding XML file if the ID changes.
confirmDeleteDescription: This action will delete the {itemType} "{itemName}" (ID: {itemId}). This action cannot be undone.
noItemsMatchSearch: Your search for "{searchTerm}" did not match any {itemType}.
noItemsFoundInZone: No {itemType} found in this zone. You can add new ones using the button above.
noExtensionsAvailable: No extensions currently available for {localityName}. You can add new ones using the button above.
extensionListCaption: A list of all extensions for {localityName}.
generalSettingsDescription: Manage general application settings like appearance and language.
dataManagementForBranchDescription: Localities for the {branchName} branch (within {zoneName} zone) are managed by editing the XML file at {dirPath}/branch/{branchId}.xml. Ensure this file contains <MenuItem> tags representing each locality. Deleting a locality here will remove it from this list and attempt to delete its department XML.
editExtensionDialogDescription: Modify the details for this extension. This will update the locality's XML file.
extensionUpdateNoChange: No changes detected for the extension.
extensionUpdateConflict: An extension with the new name and number already exists.
directoryConfigurationDescription: The directory path is fixed to `public/ivoxsdir` to ensure files are publicly accessible. All XML files should be placed within this directory, maintaining the required structure (`MainMenu.xml` at root, and `zonebranch`, `branch`, `department` subdirectories).
directoryPathInfo: Path is now fixed to 'public/ivoxsdir' for static serving.
directoryPathMustBeAbsolute: Directory path must be an absolute path.
noZonesAvailable: No zones available at the moment.
addZoneDialogDescription: Enter the name for the new zone. This will create a new entry in MainMenu.xml and a new zone branch XML file.
confirmDeleteZoneDescription: Are you absolutely sure you want to delete the zone "{zoneName}"?
confirmDeleteZoneWarningCascade: This action will permanently delete this zone and ALL its contained branches (if any) and ALL localities/departments within it. This action cannot be undone.
loginPageDescription: Please log in to access administrative features.
loginFailedError: Invalid username or password. Please try again.
loginUnexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
syncNamesFromXmlFeedDescriptionMulti: Fetch XML feeds (CiscoIPPhoneDirectory format) from multiple URLs and update the names of matching extensions in your local `{dirPath}/department` files. Extensions with conflicting names across feeds will be reported.
xmlFeedUrlsInfo: Enter each XML feed URL on a new line. The system will attempt to fetch and process all of them.
feedUrlRequiredError: At least one XML feed URL is required.
conflictedExtensionsDescription: The following extension numbers were found in multiple feeds with different names. These were not updated and require manual review:
missingExtensionsDescription: The following extensions were found in the feeds but do not exist in your local department XML files:
noMissingExtensionsDescription: There are currently no extensions from the sync feeds that are missing from local directories.
manageMissingExtensionsDescription: These extensions were found in external feeds but could not be located in any existing local directory file. Select extensions to move them to a new or existing locality.
moveExtensionsDialogDescription: You are about to move {count} extensions to a new location. Choose a destination zone and locality, or create a new locality.
fetchLocalitiesError: Failed to load localities for the selected zone.
zoneSelectionRequired: You must select a destination zone.
localitySelectionRequired: You must select a destination locality or choose to create a new one.
newLocalityNameRequired: Please enter a name for the new locality.
existingLocalitySelectionRequired: You must select an existing locality or branch.
localityExistsError: A locality or branch named "{localityName}" already exists in this zone.
networkConfigurationDescription: Configure the server address used to generate full URLs in XML files for IP phones. This is essential for physical devices to navigate the directory.
hostIpRequiredError: Host (IP Address or Domain) is required to generate phone URLs.
regenerateUrlsHint: This will regenerate all menu XMLs with full, absolute URLs for phone compatibility.
syncFromAdDescription: Automatically create and update directory entries from your Active Directory users.
adCredentialsWarning: AD credentials are not stored and are used only for this sync operation. Ensure this is run from a secure environment.
adExtensionsAddedLabel: New extensions added to XML files: {count}
adZoneCreatedLabel: A new Zone was created for AD entries.
adSyncFailedError: The synchronization from Active Directory failed. Check the server logs for details.
adSyncUnexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred during the Active Directory sync.
importExtensionsFromCsvDescription: Bulk upload extensions by providing a CSV file with the columns: Name,Extension,LocalityID,ZoneID. New departments and parent menu links will be created automatically if they don't exist.
fileReadError: Could not read the selected file.
csvImportUnexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred during the CSV import.
